
public class Main {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		System.out.println(sum(2,3));
		System.out.println(sum(20,30,40));}
		 static int sum(int a,int b)
		{
			int z;
		z=a+b;
			return z;
		}

		
		
	 static int sum(int a,int b,int c)
		{
			
			int z;
			z=a+b+c;
			return z;
		}
	}
